#summary Posterior Eye Field
@@[Home] -> [BiologicalLifeResearch] -> [BrainAreaVCA] -> [BrainRegionVCA_NC_IPS_PEF]
----

This page covers biological details of component Posterior Eye Field.
Region is part of aHuman target integrated biological model.

  * *Top-down path to region*: Neocortex -> Parietal Lobe (NC.LOBE.PAR) -> Intraparietal Sulcus (VCA.NC.IPS) -> Posterior Eye Field (VCA.NC.IPS.PEF) (see [OverallMindMaps Mind Maps])
  * *Brain area*: [BrainAreaVCA Visual Cortex Area]
  * *Brodmann ID*: 39
  * *Role*: processor
  * *Function*: Reflexive saccade triggering
(generated)
= Components =
(generated)


*Component items*:
  * Medial Intraparietal Sulcus (VCA.NC.IPS.MIP): Encode location of reach target in nose-centered coordinates
  * Lateral Intraparietal Sulcus (VCA.NC.IPS.LIP): Representing saliency of spatial locations, and attention to locations
